title: Accessing Sourcing and Procurement Data
description: Accessing Sourcing and Procurement Data

title: Configuring Master Data and Organization in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition for Service
Administering SAP Integration Suite, managed gateway for spend management and SAP Business Network
description: This advanced learning journey will provide insight into the key administrative activities, core aspects, capabilities, and configuration activities of various applications involved in the typical integration landscape for integrating SAP Business Network and SAP Ariba Applications such as SAP Ariba Buying and Invoicing, and SAP Ariba Sourcing with  SAP ERP Central Component (SAP ECC) and SAP S/4HANA using SAP Integration Suite, managed gateway for spend management and SAP Business Network.
learningObjectives: After completing this learning journey, Business Analysts, Consultants, Solution Architects, and Administrators will have a thorough understanding of the required configuration objects, intricacies, and purpose of each configuration object, and will be able to successfully configure the integration landscape end-to-end using SAP Integration Suite, managed gateway for spend management and SAP Business Network.
lscProduct: SAP Integration Suite, managed gateway for spend mgmt and SAP Business Network for SAP S/4HANA

title: Working with Technical Features in SAP Emarsys
description: Master the technical aspects of SAP Emarsys. Explore integration steps, plugins, and scripting to effectively implement real-time data solutions.

title: Setting Up Standard Connector for SAP Customer Data Cloud and SAP Emarsys
description: Learn how to integrate SAP Customer Data Cloud with SAP Emarsys using the Standard Connector. Sync customer data for personalization, consent management, and omnichannel messaging. Optimize your use of contact data effectively.

title: Creating Webhook Node Presets in SAP Emarsys
description: In this video, learn how to set up webhook node presets to connect SAP Emarsys with SAP Sales Cloud. Follow the steps to create presets for automation, ensuring secure configuration and seamless integration to enhance your marketing tactics.

title: Setting Up Standard Connector for SAP Customer Data Platform and SAP Emarsys
description: Learn to connect SAP Customer Data Platform (CDP) to SAP Emarsys, combining data from multiple sources into unified customer profiles. Discover setup steps, schema adjustments, and the Direct Data Access feature for enhanced personalization and segmentation via SAP HANA Cloud.

title: Introducing Emarsys Scripting Language in SAP Emarsys
description: Discover how Emarsys Scripting Language (ESL) enhances dynamic content creation through personalization and conditional logic. Learn key concepts like expressions and statements, with examples to tailor marketing messages using customer data.

title: Setting up Adobe Commerce Plugin in SAP Emarsys
description: Integrate Adobe Commerce with SAP Emarsys. Sync contacts, events and products for personalization. Ensure data quality and map fields. Real-time updates enhance e-commerce strategies and engagement.

title: Introducing Account Engagement in SAP Emarsys
description: Discover how an integrated marketing solution with SAP Emarsys can enhance account engagement. Learn about the importance of content, context, and collaboration in capturing customer attention and driving successful sales.

title: Configuring a Webhook Node in Automation Program in SAP Emarsys
description: This video demonstrates how to set up Webhook nodes for communication between SAP Emarsys and SAP Sales Cloud. Follow the steps to configure presets in the Replicate New Marketing Contact tactic, enabling efficient data transfer for creating tasks or leads.

title: Integrating SAP Commerce Cloud with SAP Emarsys
description: This video provides a step-by-step guide on integrating SAP Commerce Cloud with the SAP Emarsys platform using the Emarsys for SAP Commerce Cloud plugin. It covers essential setup procedures, including user creation, contact and product syncing, and activating e-commerce tactics like Real-time Abandoned Cart to enhance automated marketing and personalization efforts.

title: Setting Up Shopify Plugins in SAP Emarsys
description: In this video, we explain, step-by-step, how to connect your Shopify store to your SAP Emarsys account and then demonstrate the data flow using a Shopify event-based automation.

title: Setting Up Self-Service Smart Insight in SAP Emarsys
description: In this video, we'll guide you through setting up Smart Insight using our new self-service tool in SAP Emarsys. You'll learn how to configure the necessary settings for product, sales, and store data, as well as setting eRFM parameters to track customer engagement. This step-by-step process ensures your Smart Insight is ready to analyze and optimize your retail data effectively.

title: Exploring the Implementation Steps in SAP Emarsys
description: Learn the essential steps for implementing SAP Emarsys. This video covers pre-implementation considerations like use cases, user identification, and data mapping, followed by milestones such as configuration, channel activation, and data integration. Understand the process for activating email sending and migrating campaigns for optimal setup.

title: Explaining Data Requirements and Contact Identification in SAP Emarsys
description: Explore SAP Emarsys data requirements and contact identification. Discover how integrating diverse data sources enhances personalized communication and customer engagement through effective use of internal and external identifiers.

title: Managing Forecasts with Fiori App "Maintain PIRs" in SAP Cloud ERP
description: Dive into the world of planned independent requirements (PIRs) in this episode as we explore how they support production planning and material requirements planning (MRP). Learn about the importance of PIRs, how they're utilized within SAP Cloud ERP, and how the Maintain PIRs app can streamline your forecasting and scheduling processes. Discover seamless integration with SAP IBP and leverage analytics for improved forecasting accuracy.

title: Becoming Competent with SAP Emarsys
description: This playlist guides you through diverse digital channels and loyalty solutions to strengthen your marketing impact. Learn more about the different channels available in SAP Emarsys and how they work.

title: Working with Mobile Engage  Inbox in SAP Emarsys
description: This video demonstrates how to create and automate a Mobile Engage Inbox campaign, highlighting the benefits of inbox messages such as their persistence and higher engagement compared to push notifications. Using a practical example, it covers steps from campaign creation and content personalization to testing and performance reporting.

title: Creating Web Push Campaigns in SAP Emarsys
description: Learn how to effectively utilize web push notifications to engage customers across desktop and mobile browsers, increasing conversions and enhancing the customer journey. Discover key strategies for creating and managing successful WebPush campaigns in SAP Emarsys.
